pages.title: Shroomish
pages.text: Hmmmm, deep within the $(thing)Mist$(), there appears to be some basic plantlife. $(item)Mushrooms$() specifically. Those multicoloured ones do appear to have similar properties to flower petals I've studied in the past. I recommend you gather some - If my theory is right, they will be immensely useful. $(br)$(#f00)All colours count for this task$()
